Prebon opened his comm in response, "South by southeast of home, I'm gonna =
be a little late getting back, My unit will explain when they arrive." he c=
losed the frequency knowing that whatevers out there might be monitoring th=
ier position, "Now get going, inform them of what I found and I'll report i=
n later." With those last words to the two dragons he dove low, hugging the=
 ground flying towards the signal.

    through his cooling system=
s, "AND you will either follow orders or I will

of failure to obey the commands of your Trainer
    unit." The Trainer unit=
 pointed in the direction of the Black fortress, "NOW
    GO before I forge=
t just whos side you're on." He turned once again and began
    flying towa=
rd the source of the signal.
